title: Nada Surf Poster
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185043im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nadasurf.png)

Sorry for the small image. Anyone know what the typeface is in the words “Nada Surf”?

 [‹ Two id's](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185043/http:/typophile.com/node/18912 "Go to previous forum topic") [Luxe Bar wide techno sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185043/http:/typophile.com/node/18887 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tdominey

comments.content: Looks like [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102185043/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm) mashed up... but not a match.
I have this poster at home. I’ll check tonight if you don’t already find it.
